properties.areaDesc: Douglas; Bayfield; Southern Lake/North Shore; Carlton/South St. Louis; Ashland
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 3:07PM CST by NWS Duluth MN
properties.description:
Lake-effect snow showers will continue this afternoon for parts of
the South Shore, including northern Ashland county and the
Bayfield Peninsula, west to the Twin Ports and Carlton county. Motorists
should be prepared for rapidly changing visibilities and road
conditions. Due to the localized nature of lake-effect snow, snow
accumulations will vary across short distances. Up to 2 inches of
snow may fall locally under the heaviest bands this afternoon and
evening. Lake-effect snow showers will slowly move north through
the night, affecting the Bayfield Peninsula and Twin Ports and
eventually the North Shore to Two Harbors and Silver Bay.
